alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 3:30PM EDT until May 03 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Greene County in west central Ohio... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebanon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mason, Lebanon, Springboro, Wilmington, Franklin, Waynesville, Jamestown, Hunter, South Lebanon, New Jasper, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin, Bowersville, Port William, Paintersville, Melvin, Fort Ancient and Lytle. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 26 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central, southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central, southwestern and west central Ohio.
